strapiPost.title: Annual Ozark Quilt Fair Scheduled For Sept 10
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Shiloh Museum of Ozark History
strapiPost.content:
After two years of going virtual, the 44th Annual Ozark Quilt Fair will take place from 10-2p on Saturday, September 10, on the grounds of the Shiloh Museum of Ozark History in Springdale. 

  • Festivities: The event will include live music by Buddy Shute & the Motivators, hotdogs from Downtown Dawgs, old-time toys for children to play with, and Northwest Arkansas’s most beautiful and interesting quilts. Admission is free, and Viewers’ Choice prizes will be awarded in both new and antique quilt categories at 2p.
  • Weather: There is no rain date, so call 479.750.8165 or watch Shiloh Museum of Ozark’s social media to find out any changes on the day of the event.

Click HERE for more information.
